bug.author: jakesabathia2
bug.summary: OD predict should return bounding box coordinate in normal image scale.
bug.description:
predict for OD returns something like this <denchmark-code>'coordinates': {'y': 0.2976797819137573, 'x': -0.0002831071615219116, 'height': 0.19749416410923004, 'width': 0.3819955289363861} </denchmark-code>
for bounding box which is in normalized coordinate. Should change it to the normal coordinate as shown in the documentation.
